body: It is possible through the manipulation of a combination of the right electric currents vibrational frequencies and certain spectrums of light invisible to the human eye to create small rips in the fabric of reality/space/time in a controlled environment. usually this will result in various radiations and electrical phenomenon that are destructive to electrical equipment and can cause sickness or death if exposure to human or animal subjects is preformed, sometimes changes in the flow of time near the rip are also observable. only once out of the hitherto 64 rips currently created has any form of life been observed.
